title: Solar Engine Defense
narration: The solar engine that powers the ledger city draws solstice light into a spinning array. Sun-gremlins scramble to keep the mirrors aligned as prismatic raiders attempt to siphon the energy. The party must defend the engine and calibrate the mirrors before the timer expires.

rounds.description: Calibrate the mirrors and repel invaders.

crit_success.narration: The mirrors flare brilliantly, overcharging the solar engine.

success.narration: You lock the mirrors in place and stabilize the engine.

fail.narration: The mirror slips, scattering heat across the plaza.

success.narration: You fend off the raiders, scattering prism shards you quickly collect.

fail.narration: The raiders nick the engine, causing a flare backlash.
